detectors.description:
Reentrancy in EasyMineIco.buyTokens() (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#396-438):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(easyMineToken.transfer(msg.sender,tokensToReceive)) (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#431)
	- finalize() (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#434)
		- balance = easyMineToken.balanceOf(this) (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#490)
		- easyMineToken.burn(balance) (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#491)
	- timedTransitions() (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#400)
		- balance = easyMineToken.balanceOf(this) (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#490)
		- easyMineToken.burn(balance) (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#491)
	External calls sending eth:
	- assert(bool)(msg.sender.send(amountRemaining)) (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#427)
	- assert(bool)(wallet.send(msg.value - amountRemaining)) (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#430)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalize() (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#434)
		- stage = Stages.Ended (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#487)

detectors.description:
EasyMineTokenWallet.maxPossibleWithdrawal() (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#201-217) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-daysPassed = (now - (startTime + VESTING_PERIOD)) / 86400 (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#209)
	-res = DAILY_FUNDS_RELEASE * daysPassed - totalWithdrawn (contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#210)

	External calls:
	- [assert(bool)(msg.sender.send(amountRemaining))](contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#L427)
	- [assert(bool)(wallet.send(msg.value - amountRemaining))](contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#L430)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [finalize()](contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#L434)
		- [stage = Stages.Ended](contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#L487)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [IcoFinished(balance)](contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#L492)
		- [finalize()](contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#L434)
	- [TokensSold(msg.sender,tokensToReceive)](contractSource/scsc/Easy_Mine_ICO.sol#L437)
